Units.h File Reference
#include <cmath>

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

OpenMM uses the following units everywhere:

length: nanometers
time: picoseconds
mass: atomic mass units (daltons)
charge: proton charge
temperature: Kelvin
angle: radians
energy: kJ/mol
force: kJ/mol/nm

Because some programs use other units (e.g. Angstroms for length or kcal/mol for energy), this file defines constants which can be used to convert to and from OpenMM's units.
